Sponsorship

The Australasian Language Technology Association (ALTA) welcomes the possibility that organisations or institutions might wish to provide full or part support for the attendance of postgraduate students at either or both the ALTA Workshop or Tutorials. The organisers are happy to discuss flexible registration options to include such support; please contact the ALTA Workshop 2005 organisers.

A number of sponsorship opportunities exist; for more information contact Dominique Estival or Steven Bird.

Bronze Level: AU$500

  • logo on conference website
  • logo on all published materials (CD-ROM, program, etc)
  • publicity during breaks throughout conference
  • insert in delegates' satchels

Silver Level: AU$1000

  • logo on conference website
  • logo on all published materials (CD-ROM, program, etc)
  • publicity during breaks throughout conference
  • insert in delegates' satchels
  • single participant registration

Gold Level: AU$2000

  • logo on conference website
  • logo on all published materials (CD-ROM, program, etc)
  • publicity during breaks throughout conference
  • insert in delegates' satchels
  • single participant registration
  • display area at venue

Platinum Level: AU$4000

  • logo on conference website
  • logo on all published materials (CD-ROM, program, etc)
  • publicity during breaks throughout conference
  • insert in delegates' satchels
  • display area at venue
  • two participant registrations
  • lunchtime special lecture slot
